# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(app_hello LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(app_hello "")
set_target_properties(app_hello PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "app_hello")
set_target_properties(app_hello PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/cross/arm/release")
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET app_hello PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(app_hello PRIVATE
    src/hello/main.cpp
)

    3rd/gui/generated/widgets_init.c
    3rd/gui/generated/guider_fonts/lv_font_montserratMedium_12.c
    3rd/gui/generated/guider_fonts/lv_font_montserratMedium_16.c
)

# target
add_executable(app_main "")
set_target_properties(app_main PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "app_main")
set_target_properties(app_main PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/cross/arm/release")
target_include_directories(app_main PRIVATE
    src/lvgl_app
    3rd/gui
    3rd/gui/lvgl/src
    3rd/gui/lv_demos
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers
    3rd/gui/custom
    3rd/gui/generated
    /home/hfauto/03-T113/out/t113-bingpi_m2/staging_dir/target/usr/include

    LV_CONF_INCLUDE_SIMPLE

)

    set_property(TARGET app_main PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")

    m
    pthread
    ts
)

    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/indev/FT5406EE8.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/ILI9341.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/R61581.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/fbdev.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/UC1610.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/sunximem.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/GC9A01.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/drm.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/SHARP_MIP.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/sunxifb.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/SSD1963.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/sunxig2d.c
    3rd/gui/lv_drivers/display/ST7565.c
    3rd/gui/custom/custom.c
    3rd/gui/generated/setup_scr_screen.c
    3rd/gui/generated/events_init.c
    3rd/gui/generated/gui_guider.c
    3rd/gui/generated/widgets_init.c
    3rd/gui/generated/guider_fonts/lv_font_montserratMedium_12.c
    3rd/gui/generated/guider_fonts/lv_font_montserratMedium_16.c
)

# target
add_executable(hello "")
set_target_properties(hello PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "hello")
set_target_properties(hello PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/cross/arm/release")
target_compile_definitions(hello PRIVATE
    KBUILD_MODNAME="hello"
)
target_compile_options(hello PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isystem /home/hfauto/03-T113/prebuilt/gcc/linux-x86/arm/toolchain-sunxi-musl/toolchain/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-openwrt-linux-muslgnueabi/6.4.1/include>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-I/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/arch/arm/include>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-I/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/arch/arm/include/generated>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-I/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/include>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-I/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/arch/arm/include/uapi>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-I/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/arch/arm/include/generated/uapi>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-I/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/include/uapi>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-I/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/include/generated/uapi>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-include /home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/include/linux/kconfig.h>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-include /home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/include/linux/compiler_types.h>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-D__KERNEL__>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mlittle-endian>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wall>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wundef>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Werror=strict-prototypes>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-trigraphs>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-strict-aliasing>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-common>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fshort-wchar>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-PIE>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Werror=implicit-function-declaration>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Werror=implicit-int>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-format-security>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-dwarf2-cfi-asm>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-ipa-sra>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mabi=aapcs-linux>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mfpu=vfp>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-funwind-tables>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-marm>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wa,-mno-warn-deprecated>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-D__LINUX_ARM_ARCH__=7>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-march=armv7-a>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-msoft-float>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-delete-null-pointer-checks>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-frame-address>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fplugin=/home/hfauto/03-T113/lichee/linux-5.4/scripts/gcc-plugins/arm_ssp_per_task_plugin.so>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wframe-larger-than=2048>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fstack-protector-strong>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-unused-but-set-variable>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-unused-const-variable>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fomit-frame-pointer>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-var-tracking-assignments>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wdeclaration-after-statement>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wvla>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-pointer-sign>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-array-bounds>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Wno-maybe-uninitialized>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-strict-overflow>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-merge-all-constants>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fmerge-constants>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-stack-check>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fconserve-stack>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Werror=date-time>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Werror=incompatible-pointer-types>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-Werror=designated-init>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fplugin-arg-arm_ssp_per_task_plugin-tso=1>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fplugin-arg-arm_ssp_per_task_plugin-offset=24>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DMODULE>
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET hello PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(hello PRIVATE
    dri/hello/hello.c
)
